item.title: [B][COLOR deepskyblue]Multicanal[/COLOR][COLOR lightblue] FOX Deportes [/B][/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray] [/COLOR]

regex.name: get-url
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='https://beta.ustreamix.com/stream.php?id=fox-deportes'): import re, requests hdr = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 9_2 like Mac OS X)'} html = requests.get(url,headers=hdr,verify=False).text uip = re.findall("x_first_ip = '(.*?)'",html,re.DOTALL)[0] ohtm = eval(re.findall('Obfuscator.*?var.*?(\[.*?\])',html,re.DOTALL)[0]) oval = int(re.findall('replace.*?- (\d*)',html)[0]) phtml = '' for oht in ohtm: phtml += chr(int(re.findall('\D*(\d*)',oht.decode('base64'))[0]) - oval) strurl = re.findall("var stream = '(.*?)'",phtml)[0] hdr['Referer'] = url tokpg = requests.get('https://tmg.ustreamix.com/stats.php?p=%s'%uip,headers=hdr,verify=False).text token = re.findall('jdtk="(.*?)"',tokpg)[0] return strurl+token

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://bro.adca.st/stream.php?id=13137&p=1&c=0&stretching=uniform&old=0'): import requests, re, urllib headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:52.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/52.0'} headers['Referer'] = 'http://vipracing.info/channel/canal-2' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('trap = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] m3u8 = m3u8.decode('base64') tokenpage = re.findall('nws1 = "(.+?)"', source.text)[0] headers['Referer'] = url headers['X-Requested-With'] = 'XMLHttpRequest' headers['Accept'] = 'application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01' headers['Accept-Language'] = 'en-US,en;q=0.5' source = requests.get('http://bro.adca.st/%s'%tokenpage, headers=headers) m3u8 = m3u8 + re.findall(':"(.+?)"', source.text)[0] + '|User-Agent=%s&Referer=http://bro.adca.st/&Origin=http://bro.adca.st'%headers['User-Agent'] return m3u8

get-url #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url='https://beta.ustreamix.com/stream.php?id=showtime'): import re, requests hdr = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 9_2 like Mac OS X)'} html = requests.get(url,headers=hdr,verify=False).text uip = re.findall("x_first_ip = '(.*?)'",html,re.DOTALL)[0] ohtm = eval(re.findall('Obfuscator.*?var.*?(\[.*?\])',html,re.DOTALL)[0]) oval = int(re.findall('replace.*?- (\d*)',html)[0]) phtml = '' for oht in ohtm: phtml += chr(int(re.findall('\D*(\d*)',oht.decode('base64'))[0]) - oval) strurl = re.findall("var stream = '(.*?)'",phtml)[0] hdr['Referer'] = url tokpg = requests.get('https://tmg.ustreamix.com/stats.php?p=%s'%uip,headers=hdr,verify=False).text token = re.findall('jdtk="(.*?)"',tokpg)[0] return strurl+token
